00015 template <class T> class Table2D
00016 {
00017 
00018 private :
00019   int nx;
00020   int ny;
00021   T* data;
00022 
00023 public :
00024 
00025   Table2D(const int Nx,const int Ny):nx(Nx), ny(Ny){data= new T[nx*ny];};
00026   Table2D(const int Nx,const int Ny, T init_val):nx(Nx), ny(Ny)
00027   {data= new T[nx*ny]; for (int i=0; i<nx*ny; ++i) data[i] = init_val;};
00028   T operator () (const int i, const int j) const {return data[i+j*nx];};
00029   T& operator() (const int i, const int j) {return data[i+j*nx];};
00030   ~Table2D() {delete [] data;};
00031   
00032 };

00036 class NStarMatch : public BaseStar {
00037 
00038 friend class NStarMatchList;
00039 
00040   public :
00041 
00042   // Because we try to match n lists and because not necessary all stars will have a representant 
00043   // in each list, we need 2 numbers :
00044   int npointers;
00045   int actualMatches; 
00046   // int ref;
00047   Point* points;
00048   const BaseStar** star;
00050   public :
00051 
00052   NStarMatch(int n);
00053 
00054  
00055   NStarMatch(const BaseStar *Star, const int i, const int n);
00056 
00057   bool StarExist(const int i) const {if (!star[i]) return false; return true;}
00058 
00059   double x(const int i) const {return star[i]->x;}
00060 
00061   double y(const int i) const {return star[i]->y;}
00062 
00063   double flux(const int i) const {return star[i]->flux;}
00064 
00065   double Distance(const int i, const int j, const Gtransfo &T) const 
00066   { if (star[i] && star[j]) return  points[j].Distance(T.apply(points[i]));
00067   else return 1e8;};
00068 
00069   // these 2 routines become useless if C++ vectors are used instead of
00070   // "manual" arrays
00071   ~NStarMatch();
00072   NStarMatch(const NStarMatch &O);
00073 
00074   // private:
00075 
00076 
00077 };

00081 typedef list<NStarMatch>::iterator NStarMatchIterator;
00082 typedef list<NStarMatch>::const_iterator NStarMatchCIterator;
00083 
00084 class NStarMatchList : public list<NStarMatch> {
00085 
00086 
00087 private :
00088   int nlists;
00089   Table2D<int> nused;
00090   Table2D<int> order;
00091   Table2D<double> chi2;
00092   Table2D<Gtransfo*> transfo;
00093 
00094   BaseStarList AllStars;
00095   NStarMatchList(const NStarMatchList&); // to forbid copies
00096   const BaseStar **emptyStar;
00097 
00098 public :
00099 
00100 
00101   //  void operator=(const StarMatchList&);
00102 
00103   /* constructor */
00104   NStarMatchList(const int n);
00105 
00106 #ifdef STORAGE
00107   NStarMatchList(int n, BaseStarList &List) : nlists(n),nused(n,n),order(n,n),chi2(n,n),transfo(n,n,NULL)
00108   {
00109     for (BaseStarCIterator si = List.begin(); si != List.end(); ++si)
00110       {
00111         NStarMatch nstrm(*si,0,n);
00112         push_back(nstrm);
00113       }
00114   }
00115 #endif 
00116 
00118 
00119   Gtransfo* Transfo(int i, int j) const { return transfo(i,j);}
00120   Gtransfo*& Transfo(int i, int j) { return transfo(i,j);}
00121 
00123   int Nlists() const { return nlists;}
00124 
00126   double Chi2(int i, int j) const { return chi2(i,j);}
00127 
00129   int Nused(int i, int j) const { return nused(i,j);}
00130   
00132   int TransfoOrder(int i, int j) const {return order(i,j);}
00133 
00135   double Residual(int i, int j) const { if (nused(i,j) != 0) return sqrt(chi2(i,j)/nused(i,j)); else return -1;}
00136 
00138   void SetTransfo(const Gtransfo *Transf, const int i, const int j) 
00139   { 
00140     //    if (transfo(i,j)) delete transfo(i,j); 
00141     transfo(i,j) = Transf->Clone();
00142   }
00144   void SetTransfo(const Gtransfo &Transf, const int i, const int j) 
00145   { 
00146     //    if (transfo(i,j)) delete transfo(i,j); 
00147     transfo(i,j) = Transf.Clone();
00148   }
00149 
00150   Point ApplyTransfo(const int i, const int j, Point pt);
00151   
00154   void MatchAnotherList(const BaseStarList &List, const int rank, const double MaxDist, const BaseStar *EmptyStar );
00155   void MatchAnotherList2(const BaseStarList &List, const int rank, const double MaxDist, const BaseStar *EmptyStar );
00156   
00157   ~NStarMatchList()
00158   { 
00159     for (int i=0; i<nlists ; i++) for (int j=0; j<nlists ; j++) if (transfo(i,j)) delete transfo(i,j);
00160     for (int i=0; i<nlists; ++i) if (emptyStar[i]) delete emptyStar[i];
00161   delete [] emptyStar;
00162   }
00163   
00165     void short_write(const string &filename) const ;
00166     void short_write(ostream & pr=cout ) const ;
00167 
00169     void write(const string &filename) const ;
00170     void write(ostream & pr=cout ) const ;
00171 
00173   friend ostream& operator << (ostream &stream, const NStarMatchList &List)
00174       { stream << " number of elements " << List.size() << endl; copy(List.begin(), List.end(), ostream_iterator<NStarMatch>(stream)); return stream;} 
00175 
00176   void dump(ostream & stream = cout) const { stream << cout; }
00177 };
